posts.post_title: FS:Joss OM Walsh EPDG Huggins American Beauty
posts.post_content:
I have the following three cards available. Please message me if you have any questions or would like to purchase. I prefer Paypal ff. 
Thanks for looking, Robert

These cards are cross posted . 

PSA 3.5 Addie Joss Old Mill $1200 - PSA must have graded this one with their eyes closed. Multiple surface scuffs. Pop 1 with 1 higher, but it should be a 2 or 2.5 at best.

PSA 2 Ed Walsh EPDG Sold - Could be viewed as over graded with the rounded corners and crease in upper front left.

PSA 3 Miller Huggins American Beauty $900 - Pop 2, total pop 9.
Bump for price reduction on Joss and Walsh.
